nodes.text: Wei'val the Lesser was a female Sith who was part of the Infernal Council, a group of Sith enslaved by the Rakata warlord Soa and imprisoned with him in the Eternity Vault on the planet Belsavis.

Wei'val the Lesser appears as one of the enemies in the Infernal Council boss encounter in the "Eternity Vault" Operation in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. Wei'val only appears in the sixteen-man difficulty modes of the operation.
